content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 2 ** the pdf pattern provides an easy to follow step-by-step color photo tutorial > this pattern is part of my **5 > no-starting chain baby blankets > ebook** 4 i designed this blanket as a gift to a friend for her new niece they named the baby samma which means soar i really love this beautiful meaning and decided to name the pattern the same the pattern is based on the moss stitch and is worked in the round to create the square from the middle out there are more easy techniques involved to give more interest and texture to the blanket - skill level - easy - the pattern is written using english u s terminology - the blanket is crocheted with 2 strands of fingering yarn you can also use aran yarn and use 1 strand same amount of yarn - finished size - 32x32 82x82 cm if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2020 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this pattern are property of gootie designs **you can sell the finished product on a small scale** if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 1 https //madebygootie com/giveaways/sammas-blanket-pattern-giveaway 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/5-no-starting-chain-crochet-baby-blankets-ebook 2 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
